title.rendered: Top 10 reasons for using an Infrared Sauna

content.rendered:
Why you should start using an infrared sauna today!

An Infrared Sauna, also known as Waon therapy, is a relatively new take on the traditional sauna. Using naturally occurring infrared rays, it activates deep core warmth at a cellular level in the body, providing a range of wellbeing benefits.

Safe to use every day, and unlike a traditional sauna that heats moisture in the air around you, it is a dry sauna, which many people find more comfortable and relaxing.

Below are our Top 10 Reasons to start using an Infrared Sauna today.

  1. It detoxifies the body of toxins, and heavy metals such as lead and mercury
  2. It stimulates endorphins
  3. It boosts skin healing and rejuvenation
  4. It promotes relaxation and reduces stress hormones, such as cortisol
  5. It stimulates *ATP energy production (*ATP are energy carrying molecules within cells)
  6. It reduces pain and inflammation, and enhances muscle injury recovery
  7. It improves cardiovascular health by lowering blood pressure
  8. It boosts circulation and immunity, and increases metabolism
  9. It aids quality sleep and melatonin production
  10. It improves the lymphatic system functioning, and reduces cellulite

We have Infrared Saunas at BODHI Spa Highgate and BODHI Spa Cottesloe that you can enjoy as a stand-alone treatment or Add-On to a BODHI massage or body therapy for an extended wellbeing experience.

OUR WELLBEING GIFT TO YOU
